gov.nasa.jpf.vm

Interface Statics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<ElementInfo>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OVStatics

    public interface Statics
extends Iterable<ElementInfo>
    abstraction for the container of StaticElementInfos, which manages static fields. Note that there is a Statics instance per ClassLoaderInfo, i.e. ids are only unique within each ClassLoader namespace. This container is only growing - we don't remove/recycle classes yet Since Statics instances have to be obtained from their respective ClassLoaderInfo, and ClassLoaderInfos are the ones that map type names to ClassInfos, Statics does not include methods for name lookup. This allows implementors to use efficient lookup based on the numerical ClassInfo id (which is only unique within this Statics / ClassLoader namespace)

    • Method Detail

      • newStartupClass

        StaticElementInfo newStartupClass(ClassInfo ci,
                                ThreadInfo ti)
        startup classes are registered and initialized in two steps since object creation has to be deferred until we have at least Object and Class ClassInfos

      • newClass

        StaticElementInfo newClass(ClassInfo ci,
                         ThreadInfo ti,
                         ElementInfo eiClsObj)
        this returns the search global id which is unique within this ClassLoader namespace. This id is also stored in the respective java.lang.Class object

      • get

        StaticElementInfo get(int id)
        get an ElementInfo that might or might not be suitable for modification. This should only be used when retrieving field values. The 'id' argument has to be the result of a previous 'newClass()' call

      • getModifiable

        StaticElementInfo getModifiable(int id)
        get an ElementInfo that is guaranteed to be modifiable. This should be used when modifying field values. The 'id' argument has to be the result of a previous 'newClass()' call

        Iterable<StaticElementInfo> liveStatics()
